DOC.brief_summary: To assess the role of autologous hematopoietic cell rescue in the treatment of multiple myeloma.
DOC.brief_title: High Dose Sequential Therapy and Autologous Stem Cell Rescue for Multiple Myeloma
DOC.detailed_description: To assess the toxicity and efficacy of sequentially administered high dose cyclophosphamide and VP-16 followed by total body irradiation or BCNU and high dose mephalan and autologous stem cell rescue in the treatment of multiple myeloma.
DOC.criteria: received cytoreduction prior to transplant adequate organ function previous transplant smoldering MM or benign monoclonal gammopathy
